ROOT.GetLightCountC: select city_owner,city,count(1) c from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_fire where province_owner={2} and alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} group by city_owner,city order by c desc
ROOT.GetLightCountD: select district_owner,district,count(1) c from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_fire where city_owner={2} and alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} group by district_owner,district order by c desc
ROOT.GetLightPTime: SELECT alarm_time,longitude,latitude,1 as alarm_level FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_fire where province_owner={2} and alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} order by alarm_time
ROOT.GetLightCTime: SELECT alarm_time,longitude,latitude,1 as alarm_level FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_fire where city_owner={2} and alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} order by alarm_time
ROOT.GetLightDTime: SELECT alarm_time,longitude,latitude,1 as alarm_level FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_fire where district_owner={2} and alarm_time>={0} and alarm_time<{1} order by alarm_time
